• Eikon search string for individual stock moves: STXBZ
  • The Day Ahead newsletter: http://tmsnrt.rs/2ggOmBi
  • The Morning News Call newsletter: http://tmsnrt.rs/2fwPLTh

U.S. stock index futures fell on Monday after a week of volatile trading spurred on by mixed quarterly results from Big Tech, while Peloton jumped on reports of interest from potential buyers including e-commerce giant Amazon. .N

At 7:58 ET, Dow e-minis 1YMc1 were up 0.09% at 35,009. S&P 500 e-minis ESc1 were up 0.16% at 4,499.75, while Nasdaq 100 e-minis NQc1 were up 0.26% at 14,723.

The top three NYSE percentage gainers premarket .PRPG.NQ:
** Spirit Airlines Inc <SAVE.N>, up 11.8%
** Energizer Holdings Inc <ENR.N>, up 8.3%
** ION Geophysical Corp <IO.N>, up 7.7%

The top three NYSE percentage losers premarket .PRPL.NQ:
** Samsara Inc <IOT.N>, down 8.5%
** Zimmer Biomet Holdings Inc <ZBH.N>, down 7.2%
** American Homes 4 Rent<AMH.N>, down 6%

The top three Nasdaq percentage gainers premarket .PRPG.O:
** Anghami Inc <ANGHW.O>, up 46.8%
** Anghami (DE) Inc <ANGH.O>, up 43.3%
** Akerna Corp <KERNW.O>, up 41.0%

The top three Nasdaq percentage losers premarket .PRPL.O:
** Burgundy Technology Acquisition Corp <BTAQW.O>, down 95.8%
** AppHarvest Inc <APPHW.O>, down 25%
** Cerence Inc <CRNC.O>, down 24.6%


** Tesla Inc TSLA.O: up 0.8% premarket
BUZZ-Tesla's bitcoin holdings worth about $2 bln (Full Story)

** NOV Inc NOV.N: down 2.3% premarket
BUZZ-NOV Inc slips on JPM downgrade after Q4 loss, bleak outlook (Full Story)

** Peloton Interactive Inc PTON.O: up 34.3% premarket
BUZZ-Peloton jumps on reports Amazon, Nike weigh takeover bids (Full Story)

** Alibaba Group Holding Ltd BABA.N: down 3.5% premarket
BUZZ-Alibaba's U.S. stock falls amid speculation SoftBank could trim stake (Full Story)

** Spirit Airlines Inc SAVE.N: up 11.8% premarket
BUZZ-Spirit Airlines surges on Frontier Airlines deal (Full Story)

** Hasbro Inc HAS.O: up 2.1% premarket
BUZZ-Hasbro shares rise on earnings beat, dividend boost (Full Story)

** Astra Space Inc ASTR.O: up 5.6% premarket
BUZZ-Astra Space rises ahead of first satellite launch for NASA (Full Story)

** Elevate Credit Inc ELVT.N: up 6.5% premarket
BUZZ-Elevate Credit rises on settling litigation related to 2014 spin-off (Full Story)

** Origin Agritech Ltd SEED.O: up 13.3% premarket
BUZZ-Origin Agritech set for best day in six months on annual forecast (Full Story)
